output:
The cat's got my tongue and I just can't say
Painful thoughts hurt too much in a different way
And all I know is I must clear my mind
The river flows but just one way
Choose your course but you better come or you better stay
And all I know is I must clear my mind
Time will tell if all is well in each of these
A bright light there I can see
Shining down, coming up straight out of me
And all I know is I must clear my mind
Swimming cold on a hot day
Smiling friends, each with a lot to say
And all I know is I must clear my mind
Time will tell if all is well in each of these
